scripts.run-all: npm run build-plugins  && cd core && npm run build && cd .. && concurrently --kill-others "cd core && npm run start" "cd electron-wrapper && npm run start "
scripts.install-deps: npm install && cd core && npm install && cd ../project-one && npm install && cd ../project-two && npm install && cd ../electron-wrapper && npm install && cd ..
scripts.build-plugins: concurrently "cd project-one && npm run build-plugin" "cd project-two && npm run build-plugin"
